markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Limited">[Nettleskin](/Spells.aspx?ID=1093)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Threshold of Knowledge</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Threshold of Knowledge](/Sources.aspx?ID=109) pg. 10</row>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Thorns sprout from your body; they pass through and don't damage any clothing or armor you wear. Adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee or [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack take 1d4 piercing damage as the nettles jab them and break off. Each time a creature takes damage in this way, _nettleskin's_ duration decreases by 1 round.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d4.
name: Nettleskin

Adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee or unarmed attack take 1d4 piercing damage as the nettles jab them and break off. Each time a creature takes damage in this way, nettleskin's duration decreases by 1 round. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.
